adjectives.description: scatological (comparative more scatological, superlative most scatological)

entries.meaning: (formal) Relating to the research area of scatology, the particulate study of biological excrement, feces or dung.
examples: The scientist could read the dinosaur dung to see what it had eaten. He was an expert in scatological studies.

entries.meaning: Relating to scatology, the use of obscenities.
examples: His interest in scatological reading gained him very few friends.
